title: Types, Type Conversion, and C# Language Syntax
description: In this first episode of C# with CSharpFritz, Jeff introduces himself and our series of beginner friendly live streams talking about and teaching how to get started with C# and .NET development.  This episode focuses on declaring variables, using types, and converting between those types.

title: Making our own Types with Classes, Scope, and Interfaces
description: Last week we learned about variables and some of the built-in types in C#.  This week, Fritz takes us through the process of creating our own Types and what we can do with them
